snippet.title: Spider Tanks - Battle-to-Earn Blockchain Brawler from Gala Games and GAMEDIA
snippet.description:
Get ready for some intense metal-on-metal PVP action in the arena battling blockchain brawler everyone has been talking about!

In Spider Tanks, players own their Tanks and Weapons as blockchain-backed assets. They can be taken into battle on a multitude of unique Spider Tanks maps, or traded on secondary markets like Opensea.io. 

Spider Tanks' play-to-earn mechanics make it possible for players to play for free while upgrading and earning real rewards, even allowing you to upgrade the rarity of your Tanks!

Gala Games and GAMEDIA are about to show you what blockchain and play-to-earn can do for the world of esports... with Spider Tanks!

Get Tanks and Tank parts here:
https://bit.ly/3DzI9qL

Spider Tanks website:
https://bit.ly/3mKJCnv

Spider Tanks blog:
https://medium.com/@spidertanks

#esports #NFT #blockchaingames
